message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can move on.
Not bad, but I can do better. Your turn to decide!
You're trying to take advantage of the inflation, but I'm not falling for it. Your turn!
You're trying to be clever with the inflation, but I'm not buying it. Here's my next offer!

Not yet! I'm not giving up yet. You're getting closer, but I'm still in the driver's seat!

No more offers. I'm taking what's mine. You should have taken my previous offers when you had the chance!
